extendedIngredients.name: kale
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 head kale, washed, and thinly sliced

recipes.title: Sauteed Kale w/ Caramelized Onions
recipes.instructions: Preheat a skillet over medium heat.Add the oil and heat gently.Add the onion, stir to coat with oil, then turn the heat to low and saute for 10-15 minutes, stirring occasionally. This slow cooking over low heat sweetens the onions. You know they're ready when you taste one.....no pungent onion flavor, just luscious sweetness!Add the kale on top along w/ 1-2 tablespoons water.Increase the heat to medium and cover.Steam the kale for about 5-10 minutes until the kale is wilted and tender. Remove the lid and stir to incorporate the onions.Add some salt to taste. Sprinkle in the vinegar and pepper flakes and saute another minute or two to evaporate any leftover moisture.Taste and adjust seasonings. Try not to eat the whole batch all to yourself!

steps.step: Preheat a skillet over medium heat.
Add the oil and heat gently.

Add the onion, stir to coat with oil, then turn the heat to low and saute for 10-15 minutes, stirring occasionally. This slow cooking over low heat sweetens the onions. You know they're ready when you taste one.....no pungent onion flavor, just luscious sweetness!
Add the kale on top along w/ 1-2 tablespoons water.Increase the heat to medium and cover.Steam the kale for about 5-10 minutes until the kale is wilted and tender.
Remove the lid and stir to incorporate the onions.

Add some salt to taste. Sprinkle in the vinegar and pepper flakes and saute another minute or two to evaporate any leftover moisture.Taste and adjust seasonings. Try not to eat the whole batch all to yourself!
